example.english: The price of gasoline hasn't gone up in several years.
example.spanish: Hace varios años que no sube el precio de la gasolina.

example.english: I always keep a can of gasoline in the trunk.
example.spanish: Siempre tengo una lata de gasolina en el baúl.

example.english: I spent a lot of money on your birthday gift.
example.spanish: Gasté mucho dinero en tu regalo de cumpleaños.

example.english: The poster was given as a gift in the magazine.
example.spanish: La revista daba el póster como obsequio.

example.english: That girl is six years old.
The girl who lives next door is selling cookies.
example.spanish: La nena que vive al lado está vendiendo galletas.

example.english: Take this bag of broken glass to the recycling bin.
example.spanish: Lleva esta bolsa de vidrio roto al recipiente de reciclaje.

example.english: The glass that you ordered for the windows just arrived.
example.spanish: El cristal que pediste para las ventanas acaba de llegar.

example.english: I have to wear glasses to be able to read.
example.spanish: Tengo que llevar gafas para poder leer.

example.english: My grandfather spent years looking for gold, but never found it.
example.spanish: Mi abuelo pasó años buscando oro, pero nunca lo encontró.

example.english: The current government has been rocked by the scandal.
example.spanish: El gobierno actual ha sido sacudido por el escándalo.

example.english: How many countries have a communist government?
There are four groups of fat-soluble vitamins: A, D, E, and K.
example.spanish: Existen cuatro grupos de vitaminas liposolubles: A, D, E y K.

example.english: A group of workers went on strike to protest their inhumane working conditions.
example.spanish: Un grupo de trabajadores se fue en huelga para protestar las condiciones laborales inhumanas.
Estoy yendo a clases de guitarra.
